channel.title: Changing the home on a 317
channel.description:
In this TUT I will teach you how to change home, make the teleport, that teleports to the new home, and a client tutorial.
Needed files: Client.java, Player.java. Tested source: AllstarScape.
CHANGING HOME:
Step 1. Open your source folder run the server first and log on it. Now find the place you want as home and type [code]::mypos[/code] [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/L1-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/L2-1.jpg[/img]
Now remember that coords.
Step 2. Now go in Player.java thats located at the bottom of source folder. [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/L3-1.jpg[/img] [code]// initial x and y[/code] [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/L4-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/L5-2.jpg[/img] Now change the the both coord X, Y, coord to that you found in step 1. Now save and compile. That was easy
CHANGING HOME TELEPORT THAT TELEPORTS TO THE NEW HOME:
Step 1. Go in Client.java that is located at the top of your source folder. [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/L6-1.jpg[/img]
Now press CTRL + H or CTRL + F search for [code]} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { [/code] [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/L7-2.jpg[/img] You should see something like this. [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/L8-1.jpg[/img] Now change the coord X, Y, to that you found in home changing step 1. Now save and compile, now try logon your server and test the teleport. See that wasnt hard
On this tutorial I will teach you how to change background in your client and how its auto connect to your server.
Tested source: AllstarScape Needed files: Client.java, EGUI.java.
AUTO CONNECT SERVER.
Step 1. Open up your client folder go in client.java search for [code]setserver[/code] you should see something like this [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/T1-1.jpg[/img] Now change the IP to your IP, now save it.
Step 2. Go in EGUI/GUI in your client folder open it up and you should see something like this [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/T2-1.jpg[/img] Now change the IP to your IP, now save and compile. That was easy right
CHANGING THE CLIENT BACKGROUND:
Step 1. First find a picture that is big enough to the client when you found a one save it as PNG or JPEG (It depends on what the picture in the client is). Now in your client folder go to the picture right click on it and press edit with paint. [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv339/whip_pker/T3-1.jpg[/img]
Step 2. Now when you are in the paint with the client picture go in the left top corner press files and press open
Step 3. Now find the picture that you want as client background, now open it and it comes in paint, now save it on the old client picture and dont RENAME it. Now save and compile, now your done. That wasnt hard As you expected
Now try run the client and see all of this worked it should work. If you got problems you can contact me at D.Man2011@Yahoo.Com
ENJOY IT!

item.title: Changing the home on a 317
item.dc:creator: @I_Beasty_I I Beasty I
item.description:
@I_Beasty_I wrote:

In this TUT I will teach you how to change home, make the teleport, that teleports to the new home, and a client tutorial.

Needed files: Client.java, Player.java.
Tested source: AllstarScape.

CHANGING HOME:

Step 1. Open your source folder run the server first and log on it. Now find the place you want as home and type

::mypos


Now remember that coords.

Step 2. Now go in Player.java thats located at the bottom of source folder.

// initial x and y



Now change the the both coord X, Y, coord to that you found in step 1. Now save and compile. That was easy

CHANGING HOME TELEPORT THAT TELEPORTS TO THE NEW HOME:

Step 1. Go in Client.java that is located at the top of your source folder.

Now press CTRL + H or CTRL + F search for

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {


You should see something like this.

Now change the coord X, Y, to that you found in home changing step 1. Now save and compile, now try logon your server and test the teleport. See that wasnt hard

On this tutorial I will teach you how to change background in your client and how its auto connect to your server.

Tested source: AllstarScape
Needed files: Client.java, EGUI.java.

AUTO CONNECT SERVER.

Step 1. Open up your client folder go in client.java search for

setserver

you should see something like this

Now change the IP to your IP, now save it.

Step 2. Go in EGUI/GUI in your client folder open it up and you should see something like this

Now change the IP to your IP, now save and compile. That was easy right

CHANGING THE CLIENT BACKGROUND:

Step 1. First find a picture that is big enough to the client when you found a one save it as PNG or JPEG (It depends on what the picture in the client is). Now in your client folder go to the picture right click on it and press edit with paint.

Step 2. Now when you are in the paint with the client picture go in the left top corner press files and press open

Step 3. Now find the picture that you want as client background, now open it and it comes in paint, now save it on the old client picture and dont RENAME it. Now save and compile, now your done. That wasnt hard As you expected

Now try run the client and see all of this worked it should work. If you got problems you can contact me at D.Man2011@Yahoo.Com

ENJOY IT!
